document_data.name: North Thorass
document_data.mainbody: The '''North Thorass languages''' were two languages in the larger [[Thorass languages]] group.<ref name=D:SiT-p28>{{Cite dragon/Speaking in Tongues|28}}
document_data.Languages: The only living North Thorass language was [[Tharian]], which derived from now-dead [[Auld Tharian]].<ref name=D:SiT-p28/>
